data.name: Seven Sins - Academic Version
data.detailed_description:
Seven Sins

Welcome to the game of sins. As part of a group of 4-6 players you try to survive the dangers around you, but as an individual you have to fulfill your own tasks to win the game. Some of your fellow adventurers will cooperate with you, but be aware of traitors. Honorless individuals, who try to harm you as soon as they get a chance to.


The nature around the camp will provide you with everything you need to survive. The farther away from the camp, the more treasures you can find. However be aware of dangers! Creatures like bears can cross your way and you better don't stay out during night...

Cooperation is key as not even those stained by one of the seven sins can survive alone in the harsh environment that demands its daylie tribute. Trade, communicate and coordinate your resource management as a group to make it through each hard earned day.

Construct buildings to improve the productivity of the camp or follow the evil route and sabotage your teammates - blow up their buildings or craft daggers and pistols and as soon as they turn their backs...
data.about_the_game:
Seven Sins

Welcome to the game of sins. As part of a group of 4-6 players you try to survive the dangers around you, but as an individual you have to fulfill your own tasks to win the game. Some of your fellow adventurers will cooperate with you, but be aware of traitors. Honorless individuals, who try to harm you as soon as they get a chance to.


The nature around the camp will provide you with everything you need to survive. The farther away from the camp, the more treasures you can find. However be aware of dangers! Creatures like bears can cross your way and you better don't stay out during night...

Cooperation is key as not even those stained by one of the seven sins can survive alone in the harsh environment that demands its daylie tribute. Trade, communicate and coordinate your resource management as a group to make it through each hard earned day.

Construct buildings to improve the productivity of the camp or follow the evil route and sabotage your teammates - blow up their buildings or craft daggers and pistols and as soon as they turn their backs...
data.short_description: Seven Sins is a 4-6 player online multiplayer game, in which you and your teammates have to work together in order to survive - but beware! Everyone could be stained with one of the seven sins or decide to betray the group and follow their own goals...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
